reviewText: Great basic information about an incredibly intelligent and noble woman.  The kids loved learning about Marie Curie.  The information was informative enough for my 10 year old and presented nicely in story format to keep my 7 year old and 4 year old engaged.  My 7 year old especially enjoyed challenging himself with the quiz questions at the end.  We love these Animated Hero Classics and hope to continue adding to our collection of them.
My students really enjoyed the movie they had just learned about her in their Science class and we were reading a story on her in Language Arts.

The film is very nice and it is useful as a motivation element for students in order to know the life or biography of one of the greatest scientists of all times. The first woman who has received two Nobel Prizes, Mme. Curie.
